content: super scrubbie 2 sizes - free crochet pattern by sara sach please add this crochet pattern to your ravelry favorites we just retested and updated this pattern with a photo tutorial and lost of pictures we also added a brand new video ***free pattern link *** https //poshpoochdesignsdogclothes blogspot com/2015/08/super-scrubbie-crochet-pattern-and-red html ***video link *** https //youtu be/qanomhqerdg skill easy materials crochet hook j / 6 00 mm yarn scrubby 4 1 oz cotton yarn 4 1oz yarn needle 1 stitch marker stitches chain chain single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch size small - 6 x 6 inches medium - 8 x 8 inches please do not copy or redistribute this crochet pattern
